body.name: Colgate Slimsoft Floss-Tip Charcoal Toothbrush, Soft (4 Count)
features: Charcoal toothbrush with 17x slimmer tip bristles for a deep and gentle clean
Floss tip bristles sweep away food and plaque from along the gum line and hard to reach areas
Soft toothbrush provides a gentle clean for sensitive teeth
Contains a total of 4 charcoal toothbrushes that are also black toothbrushes
vs. regular end rounded bristles.This toothbrush does not replace flossing
body.description: Colgate Floss-Tip Charcoal Toothbrush, with charcoal infused bristles, is specially designed with 17x slimmer tip bristles for a deep and gentle clean*. The black toothbrush bristles help to sweep away food and plaque from along the gum line and in between teeth. This toothbrush, however, should not replace flossing. This soft toothbrush provides a gentle clean for sensitive teeth. *vs. regular end-rounded bristles

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #46,580 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #275 in Manual Toothbrushes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Colgate SlimSoft Charcoal Toothbrush • Charcoal toothbrush with soft bristles. • 17x slimmer tip bristles* for a deep and gentle clean • *vs. regular Colgate end-rounded bristles • Sweeps away food and plaque from along the gumline. • Available in Soft bristle firmness. • Colors may vary.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My teeth feel extremely clean.
reviews.reviewText: They’re soft but they sure do clean good! My teeth and gums feel amazing! Very good product I will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 11, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I WILL BUY AGAIN
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never heard of a charcoal infused toothbrush before, so I was kinda confused when I went scouting out some new toothbrushes for me and my girlfriend earlier this week, this one was sponsored and had decent reviews so I figured why not, to be honest the only thing going for it at the time for me was that the bristles were black so being a total guy in my decision making, I thought it was cool enough to buy. Upon receiving, and opening and using, this has. been the most invigorating feel of a toothbrush I have ever felt. It doesn’t look like it, but you can feel how much longer the bristles are, and how much deeper of a clean it’s getting near the gum line. Also, extremely soft, but not so soft to the point where you don’t feel like it’s cleaning, it’s soft on the teeth and gums, YET somehow you can feel the scrubbing action as you brush and how good it is at reaching certain points between the teeth. Also the toothbrush is slim and sleek in design, comfortably maneuvers around the mouth. I LOVE this brush. will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly soft and still do the job!
reviews.reviewText: I never know brushing teeth can be like a mini massage!I’ve always used electrical toothbrush, thinking that it’ll clean better but no! After recovering from wisdom teeth removal surgery, my gums are super sensitive. It hurts to brush my teeth! I literally have to manually remove gunks near the gums because my electrical toothbrush caused too much pain. Of course, this result in some gum recession! :(Other regular manual toothbrushes I have tried weren’t really that much better until I ran across this and decided to give it a try. I just had my first brush and it was like a little massage to the gums! My teeth hasn’t felt this clean after a brush for a long time! I’m so happy!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for sensitive teeth
reviews.reviewText: A little thinner than I expected but the bristles are really soft which is what I was looking for. Sometimes it’s hard to find super soft bristles in stores. They are labelled as soft but I would say they are super soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They are as stated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received these toothbrushes about three weeks ago. They're great on teeth and easy on the gums. I used to use electric toothbrushes, but, after a while, they began to wear away my gum tissue. So I turned to these and I'm quite content with using them over the electric ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toothbrush, poor order experience.
reviews.reviewText: The bristles are soft, but hold form. They work very well. I could notice the difference just from brushing once. I love the color black as well, lol.One HUGE annoyance was the order. They sent me 2 toothbrushes for this 4 count. There is no return option that lets you select missing items or order not received. I had to google how to contact Amazon, then use the chat to get a replacement. The only relevant option there was items not received at all, & the chat has response selections instead of talking to someone. I have prime solely for shipping, and can't really send back items I need now just because half of them are missing. Reading other reviews this seems to be a prevalent issue with this specific item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Small brush head which is too soft
reviews.reviewText: I bought 4 of these toothbrushes to go with the charcoal Colgate toothpaste. The head is very slim and small which feel child like. The brush is way too soft to do any tooth scrubbing. It feels more like a water color paintbrush. The only advantage is that you can reach deeper teeth easier. I would only recommend this is you have extreme sensitivity or using dentures.
These charcoal toothbrushes seem to last longer than others who get bent and out of shape quickly. I will keep buying them.
Me lo recomendó mi dentista y funcionó perfecto , muy suaves y los hilos con muy buena punta .
J'aime bien les oies de ces brosses.
